categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Scope" was the nickname of a clone snowtrooper serving in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

The clone trooper nicknamed "Scope" served in the Skirmish on Carlac alongside a Jedi General, Clone Commander CC-3636, and other members of the 104th Battalion. He was stationed at the Republic Outpost, working as a speeder vendor.
